model.bonus_type



enum BonusType: byte;
Bonus type.
Besides the primary effect each taken bonus gives 
game.bonusScoreAmount
score points to the player. The wizard gains the same amount as xp.

Empower
Dramatically increases the damage of ranged and melee attacks for some time.

Haste
Grants the 
Hastened
status to the wizard.
Duration of the status is longer than usually.

Shield
Grants the 
Shielded
status to the wizard.
Duration of the status is longer than usually.
